activities: Delivra provides email marketing services to customers through a web-based Software as a Service (SaaS) Platform.  Each customer has a secured individual account in which they can load their contact information and recipient lists.  These accounts are secured through encryption and password security.  In addition to this security, Delivra also maintains strict controls internally to ensure that all customer data is secure.
privacyprograms:
Direct Marketing Association (DMA) Privacy Program
Fact Act Compliant
GLB Compliant
recoursemech: All SPAM and other related complaints are taken seriously and are acted upon within the day of receipt. Direct Marketing Association (DMA) Safe Harbor Program (i.e., dispute arbitration services provided through membership with DMA).
